dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Motor winding; Electrical winding; Generator winding; Stator winding;
Motor winding; Electrical winding; Generator winding; Stator winding;
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The armature winding refers to the coils that are placed on the armature of an electric machine, which can be a motor or a generator. These windings are responsible for carrying an alternating current and are integral to the functioning of the machine. The description of the armature winding includes information on its manufacturing process, the materials used, its configuration, design standards it complies with, the quality, its applications in motors or generators, and how it is wound (i.e., lap winding or wave winding). Details about whether it is sourced as part of a production mix, or if it is supplied to the consumer as a final product are also included, along with its location availability.
电机绕组指的是放置在电动机器的电枢上的线圈，这种机器可以是电动机或发电机。这些绕组承载交流电，是机器功能不可或缺的部分。电机绕组的描述包括其制造过程，使用的材料，其配置，它符合的设计标准，质量，以及它在电动机或发电机中的应用，还包括它是如何绕制的（例如，搭接绕组或波浪绕组）。细节还包括它是作为生产混合物的一部分来源，还是作为最终产品提供给消费者的信息，以及其位置的可用性。
